casebody.data:
Cuyahoga County Bar Association v. Rubino.

[Cite as Cuyahoga Cty. Bar Assn. v. Rubino (2000), 87 Ohio St.3d 466.]

(No. 99-1560 Submitted October 12, 1999 Decided January 5, 2000.) *467Mary Ann Rini, Joan M. Litzow and John D. Sutula, for relator. Carl C. Monastra, for respondent. Per Curiam.

We adopt the findings, conclusion, and recommendation of the board. An attorney is required to cooperate with a disciplinary investigation even when the subject of the investigation is himself. Lake Cty. Bar Assn. v. Vala (1998), 82 Ohio St.3d 57, 59, 693 N.E.2d 1083, 1084. Respondent is hereby publicly reprimanded. Costs are taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
